amendment.description: To provide funds for research and development grants to increase security for United States ports.

vote.text: Amendment SA 31 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 31 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S1061-1064; text: CR S1061; text as modified: CR S1062) To provide funds for research and development grants to increase security for United States ports.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 31 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 31 proposed by Senator Schumer.
